title: How long does a ticket usually take to be processed from riot support
body: Just curious as I've been having a problem with latency and I have issued a ticket

replies.body:
It's hard to estimate, as it really depends on when the ticket is submitted and how big that team's queue is. I can confirm that the end of a ranked season almost always results in a large influx of tickets, so wait times may be a bit longer than normal right now.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Any idea how long gifting will be down on the new client? or how I can swap back to the old client. It's my friends birthday but I can't buy him the skin he wants... T_T

I'm not sure how long it will be down, but I feel you on wanting it in there. It's pretty annoying to have to switch back to the legacy client to simply gift someone, but I understand that there were many other more crucial features that took priority over gifting. You can easily swap to the Legacy client at the login screen with the button at the bottom, as shown below:

(Click to enlarge)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any other questions! ^.^
